Class Customer

java.lang.Object
Customer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Customer extends Object implements Serializable
The Customer class represents a customer in the pet adoption system. It stores customer details such as personal information, contact details, and adoption-related data. This class also provides methods for managing adoption requests, viewing adoption statuses, and interacting with pets.

Implements Serializable to allow instances of this class to be serialized for storage or transmission.

Key functionalities include:

  • Checking eligibility for adoption
  • Submitting and canceling adoption requests
  • Viewing available pets and adopted pets
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String customerId, String name, String gender, String address, String email, String phone, int birthYear, String password, String username)
      Constructs a new Customer object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the unique ID of the customer
      name - the name of the customer
      gender - the gender of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      email - the email address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      birthYear - the birth year of the customer
      password - the password for the customer's account
      username - the username for the customer's account

  • Method Details

    • isEligibleToAdopt

      public boolean isEligibleToAdopt()
      Checks if the customer is eligible to adopt a pet. A customer is eligible if they are at least 21 years old.
      Returns:
      true if the customer is eligible to adopt, false otherwise.

    • requestAdoption

      public AdoptionRequest requestAdoption(String animalID)
      Submits an adoption request for a pet.
      Parameters:
      animalID - the ID of the pet to be adopted
      Returns:
      an AdoptionRequest object if the request is valid, or null if the customer is not eligible or the animal ID is invalid

    • cancelAdoptionRequest

      public boolean cancelAdoptionRequest(List<AdoptionRequest> requests, String animalId)
      Cancels an adoption request for a specific pet.
      Parameters:
      requests - the list of existing adoption requests
      animalId - the ID of the pet for which the request is to be canceled
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully canceled, false otherwise

    • viewAdoptionStatus

      public void viewAdoptionStatus(List<AdoptionRequest> requests)
      Displays the adoption status of the customer.
      Parameters:
      requests - the list of adoption requests

    • viewPets

      public void viewPets(List<Pet> animals)
      Displays a list of available pets for adoption.
      Parameters:
      animals - the list of all pets

    • viewAdoptedPets

      public void viewAdoptedPets()
      Displays a list of pets adopted by the customer.

    • addAdoptedPet

      public void addAdoptedPet(String animalID)
      Adds a pet to the list of adopted pets for the customer.
      Parameters:
      animalID - the ID of the pet to be added
